    Interface IWebSecurityAddIn

    Security AddIns that are made available to the user for survey access security purposes must implement this interface

    Namespace: Votations.NSurvey.Security
    Assembly: SurveyProject.WebControls.dll
    Syntax

    GetAddInVoterData(Int32)

    Can return keys/values of the custom stored data during the ProcessVoterData. At this time these data are retrieved to be shown in individual reports and for results export
